name: Scott Ryan
headline: Solution Architect
summary: Ideal role for me is one that puts the team in a position with clients where we can collaborate and whiteboard solutions to overcome their technical problems, designing and bringing to market solutions involving cloud platforms, storage, and GPU-accelerated workloads.

experience.title: Solution Architect
experience.location: AZ, NV, WA, OR, ID, AK
responsibilities: Developed multiple territories through expert architecture of multi-cloud management, disaster recovery, data protection and business continuity.
Collected requirements and whiteboarded hyper-converged infrastructure and hypervisor-attached storage solutions.
Guided clients through optimizing GPU-accelerated workloads using NVIDIA AI Enterprise and DGX Cloud.
Transitioned a fast-growing city to modern modular infrastructure avoiding 3–5× renewal fees from previous cloud vendors.
Assisted universities and school districts with tuning, modernizing, and managing hybrid multi-cloud database workloads to reduce licensing and improve performance.
Implemented Kubernetes management and containerized development workflows to help development teams and control budgets.
Enabled universities to automate deployment, cost/chargeback control, and protection from ransomware/outages.

experience.title: Cloud Storage Solution Architect
responsibilities: Provided cloud storage strategy and GTM support for Fortune 500 and geographically distributed enterprise application teams.
Deployed edge data sites for Oil & Gas clients across APAC (Pacific and Indian Oceans).
Designed a cloud storage solution to support 80k concurrent video exam users for an Indian education client.
Worked with Product Management for SoftNAS and Edge to enable high-volume on-prem to cloud migrations, high-performance tiered storage, and data pipelines between edge and cloud.

experience.title: Solution Architect Manager
responsibilities: Led pre-sales solution design and post-sales implementation.
Reduced clients' technology and communications budgets by ~25%.
Drove adoption of Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud services.

experience.title: Solution Architect Director
responsibilities: Delivered demos, proposals, and proof of concepts for enterprise cloud migrations.
Developed technical sales materials and SKUs for services.
Migrated applications from corporate datacenters to AWS and Azure, reducing operating costs in some cases by ~90%.

experience.title: Partner Technology Specialist
responsibilities: Designed and delivered AWS & Azure cloud data and storage solutions.
Member of Microsoft Virtual Technology Solutions Partner (V‑TSP) team to create new business opportunities around Microsoft technologies.

experience.title: Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Spearheaded cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise automation tools, boosting adoption by ~20% through strategic alliances.
Led product demonstrations and on-site support for factory automation solutions, saving over $500K in production costs.
Managed software/mechanical upgrades and earned Intel’s Enterprise Software Technology Award for product validation and solution implementation.
